description: Discover this exceptional duplex for sale in Schilde, a unique opportunity to own a luxurious property with breathtaking views over the Albertkanaal. Two additional bedrooms, sized at 18 and 22 square meters respectively, feature parquet flooring and share access to the second terrace. A large laundry room with built-in storage completes this level. The basement is an added highlight, providing ample space for hobbies, fitness, or entertainment—complete with a wine cellar. The outdoor terraces and surrounding landscaped garden enhance the property's appeal, offering ideal settings for relaxation or social gatherings. Located in a serene area close to Massenhoven’s church and only five minutes from Zandhoven’s lively town center, this property combines privacy with convenience. The low energy consumption (EPC at 87.82 kWh/m²/year) along with features such as fly screens on all windows and energy-efficient systems make this residence both environmentally friendly and cost-effective to maintain. For those seeking an exclusive home that blends modern luxury with natural beauty and panoramic views, this duplex in Schilde represents an outstanding opportunity. Technisch bevindt deze BEN-woning zich op het allerhoogste niveau: warmtepomp, airco, vloerverwarming, zonnepanelen en een E-peil van slechts 2. Het resultaat? Een uitzonderlijk energiezuinige thuis met een optimaal binnenklimaat doorheen elk seizoen. Gelegen op een rustige maar centrale locatie, op korte afstand van winkels, scholen en belangrijke verbindingen, combineert deze woning comfort met bereikbaarheid.
